roleset.name: to give a thrashing to
roleset.note: LAMBASTE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'lambaste' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from lambaste.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: China frequently lambastes the U.S. Embassy for [*-2] harboring astrophysicist Fang Lizhi , a political dissident who [*T*-1]took refuge there after the massacre .
example.arg: for [*-2] harboring astrophysicist Fang Lizhi , a political dissident who [*T*-1]took refuge there after the massacre
